trans-unit.source: Provides data for mouse events raised by a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> whenever the mouse is moved within a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Fornisce dati per gli eventi di mouse generati da un <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> quando il mouse viene spostato all'interno di un <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The DataGridViewCellMouseEventArgs class provides data for the following <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> events: - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellMouseClick> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellMouseDoubleClick> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellMouseDown> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellMouseMove> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellMouseUp> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeaderMouseClick> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeaderMouseDoubleClick> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeaderMouseClick> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeaderMouseDoubleClick>
trans-unit.target: La classe DataGridViewCellMouseEventArgs fornisce dati per gli elementi seguenti <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>eventi:- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellMouseClick>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellMouseDoubleClick>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellMouseDown>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellMouseMove>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellMouseUp>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeaderMouseClick>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeaderMouseDoubleClick>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeaderMouseClick>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeaderMouseDoubleClick></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeaderMouseDoubleClick> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeaderMouseClick> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeaderMouseDoubleClick> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeaderMouseClick> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellMouseUp> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellMouseMove> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellMouseDown> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellMouseDoubleClick> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellMouseClick> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellMouseEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellMouseEventArgs"> </xref> classe.
Indice di colonna in base zero della cella.
Indice di riga in base zero della cella.

trans-unit.source: The x-coordinate of the mouse, in pixels.
trans-unit.target: La coordinata x del mouse espressa in pixel.

trans-unit.source: The y-coordinate of the mouse, in pixels.
trans-unit.target: La coordinata y del mouse espressa in pixel.

trans-unit.source: Gets the zero-based column index of the cell.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene l'indice di colonna in base zero della cella.

trans-unit.source: An integer specifying the column index.
trans-unit.target: Valore intero che specifica l'indice di colonna.

trans-unit.source: Gets the zero-based row index of the cell.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene l'indice di riga in base zero della cella.

trans-unit.source: An integer specifying the row index.
trans-unit.target: Valore intero che specifica l'indice di riga.
